title: Snowpiercer
plot: Captain America leads a rebellion on a post-Apocalyptic train.

title: The Fifth Element
story: Bruce Willis only speaks two languages: English, and Bad English.

title: Black Swan
description: Natalie Portman blows the audiences mind as her quest for perfection wrestles with her sanity.

title: Akira
story: A young biker gang member in Neo-Tokyo gets in over his head, when a run-in with a government pyshic evolution program leads to his capture.
